title: My Top Boy Is like a Dog - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Psychological   Romance   School Life   Yaoi
tags: Clever Protagonist   Cute Story   Doting Love Interests   Heartwarming   Manly Gay Couple   Naive Protagonist   Roommates
author: Avocado Milkshake   牛油果奶昔
description:
A trapping game attracted Gu He and he was forced to show his love.

Unexpectedly, words said in the game were taken as true.

Lu Chuan replied:”Then I will be your boyfriend.”

What? A boyfriend for a boy?>
